abstract: Countrywide Financial shareholders vote on Wednesday to approve the largest U.S. mortgage lender’s purchase by Bank of America, marking the demise of the company perhaps most closely associated with the nation’s housing bubble and subsequent collapse.
lead_paragraph: Countrywide Financial shareholders vote on Wednesday to approve the largest U.S. mortgage lender’s purchase by Bank of America, marking the demise of the company perhaps most closely associated with the nation’s housing bubble and subsequent collapse.

headline.main: Countrywide Shareholders to Vote on Bank of America Deal

abstract: Given that the Illinois attorney general’s office is planning to file a civil lawsuit against Countrywide Financial and its chief executive, Angelo Mozilo – alleging unfair and deceptive practices in mortgage loans – Mr. Mozilo must be crossing his fingers (twice!) that the Bank of America deal occurs.
lead_paragraph: Given that the Illinois attorney general’s office is planning to file a civil lawsuit against Countrywide Financial and its chief executive, Angelo Mozilo – alleging unfair and deceptive practices in mortgage loans – Mr. Mozilo must be crossing his fingers (twice!) that the Bank of America deal occurs.
